results.content:
I think the maximum of a course is 4 stars.

There is always an extra star for dedication to the instructor's responses.

In this case the answers were null, so the maximum is 4 stars, of which I rate with 2.5
The positive are the topics to be discussed and the tutos performed.
The negative is the speed with which the course is given, and the little detail of the explanations. Also I did not use spring boot but something obsolete like jsp.
There is no reference to SPA technologies such as Angular2.
And it's all given to researching, when udemy's idea is to save research time in exchange for course purchase.

Greetings, Juan,

results.content:
Tutorial was good. It will be helpful for us if you add a small project based on what you have covered. May be like a small login module with some basic functionalities. It will help us to understand it better. I am looking forward to it. 

Thank you.
